name: Tackle
desc: Deals once-off damage.

name: Growl
desc: Decreases target's Attack by 1 level.

name: Leech Seed
desc: Damages the enemy, stealing some of their health.

name: Vine Whip
desc: Deals once-off damage.

name: Poison Powder
desc: Poisons the enemy, reducing their maximum health.

name: Razor Leaf
desc: Deals once-off damage with a high critical hit chance.

name: Growth
desc: Increases active Pokémon's Special by 1 stage.

name: Sleep Powder
desc: Makes the enemy very sleeeeepy..... Slows them down by 1 stage.

name: Solar Beam
desc: A powerfull beam of light blasts the enemy, doing high damage

name: Scratch
desc: Deals once-off damage.

name: Ember
desc: Starts a small fire under the enemy, doing moderate fire damage.

name: Leer
desc: Decreases target's Defense by 1 stage.

name: Rage
desc: Increases active Pokémon's Attack by 1 stage.

name: Slash
desc: Deals large once-off damage with a high critical hit chance.

name: Flamethrower
desc: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire.

name: Fire Spin
desc: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire.

name: Tail Whip
desc: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

name: Bubble
desc: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing team, slowing ther targets speed.

name: Water Gun
desc: The target is blasted with a forcefull shot of water.

name: Bite
desc: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs!

name: Withdraw
desc: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its defense stat.

name: Skull Bash
desc: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense, then rams the target.

name: Hydro Pump
desc: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

name: String Shot
desc: The target is bound with silk blown from the user's mouth. This silk reduces the targets' Speed stat.

name: Harden
desc: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

name: Confusion
desc: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force

name: Supersonic
desc: The user generates odd sound waves from its body, lowering the targets special resistance.

name: Psybeam
desc: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray.

name: Poison Sting
desc: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger.

name: Fury Attack
desc: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak.

name: Focus Energy
desc: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that attacks will be more powerfull.

name: Twineedle
desc: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes.

name: Pin Missile
desc: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession.

name: Agility
desc: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

name: Gust
desc: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

name: Sand Attack
desc: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its attack power.

name: Quick Attack
desc: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It increases in speed with this move.

name: Wing Attack
desc: The target is struck with alrge, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

name: Screech
desc: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

name: Bind
desc: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the foe.

name: Rock Throw
desc: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

name: Slam
desc: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

name: Crunch
desc: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs.

name: Disable
desc: The target is partially disabled, reducing its ability to attack.

name: Psychic
desc: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force.

name: Reflect
desc: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from attacks.

name: Wrap
desc: A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the target.

name: Glare
desc: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly, lowering its defense.

name: Acid
desc: The opposing team is attacked with a spray of harsh acid.

name: Thunder Shock
desc: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage.

name: Charm
desc: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. The target's Attack is harsly lowered.

name: Thunder Wave
desc: A weak electric charge is launched at the target, lowering its special defense.

name: Sweet Kiss
desc: The user kisses the target with a sweet angelic cuteness that causes a sharp loss in defense.

name: Swift
desc: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing team. This attack rarely misses.

name: Thunder
desc: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage.

name: Fury Swipes
desc: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes in quick succession.

name: Double Kick
desc: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

name: Body Slam
desc: The user drops on to the target with its full body weight.
